#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int a[26],b[26],t,i,len;
	string c;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			a[i]=0;
			b[i]=0;
		}
		cin>>c;
		for(i=0;i<c.length();i++)
		{
			if(i%2==0)
			a[c[i]-'a']++;
			else
			b[c[i]-'a']++;
		}
		len=c.length();
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]>1)
			len+=(a[i]*(a[i]-1))/2;
			if(b[i]>1)
			len+=(b[i]*(b[i]-1))/2;
		}
		printf("%d\n",len);
	}
}
